n: Awesome Egg Salad with a Kick
des: "Egg salad kicked up with Dijon mustard, crumbled bacon and horseradish.  I use light mayo and sour cream to keep it healthy.  Serve on lightly toasted wheat rolls with lettuce and tomato."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the eggs, mayonnaise, sour cream, paprika, mustard, horseradish, red onion and bacon bits. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
